entry.title: Investigating reports of degraded performance.
entry.content:
Nov 30, 17:13 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 30, 17:12 UTC
Update - The issue affecting the new code view beta has been resolved.

Nov 30, 16:21 UTC
Update - We have diagnosed that the ongoing issue related to code search and code view is limited to customers in the current beta for those features. A mitigation has been identified and is in progress.

Nov 30, 16:03 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): GitHub Search and the new Code View. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Nov 30, 16:02 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Incident with Packages and Pages
entry.content:
Nov 25, 16:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 25, 16:13 UTC
Update - GitHub Packages has almost fully recovered. Continuing to restore remaining traffic and ensure service remains healthy before returning to green.

Nov 25, 15:50 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Nov 25, 15:45 UTC
Update - Following mitigations being put in place, we are seeing recovery for GitHub Packages, GitHub Pages and ghcr.io. We are monitoring this recovery and will continue to update.

Nov 25, 15:40 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Nov 25, 15:11 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Packages. GitHub Pages and ghcr.io are also impacted. We will continue to update users as we progress towards mitigation.

Nov 25, 15:06 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Nov 25, 14:39 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Nov 25, 14:39 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Packages.

entry.title: GitHub Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Nov 4, 04:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 4, 03:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 17:00 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

entry.title: GitHub Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Oct 27, 16:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 27, 15:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 20, 16:54 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

Oct 26, 04:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 26, 03:13 UTC
Update - Codespaces is still experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 26, 02:34 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 26, 02:33 UTC
Update - Issues is operating normally.

Oct 26, 02:33 UTC
Update - We have resolved Issues performance, and are continuing to investigate degraded performance for Codespaces in US East.

Oct 26, 01:55 UTC
Update - We are investigating Codespace degraded performance in US East. To change region
https://docs.github.com/en/codespaces/customizing-your-codespace/setting-your-default-region-for-github-codespaces

Oct 26, 01:25 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate reports of issues with service(s): Issues, Codespaces. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Oct 26, 00:52 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Oct 26, 00:47 UTC
